title: Training Status
text:
Volume Development
Changed Heart Rate Zones for all types to the same as running to make it comparable on the 12th of February 2026 (calendar week 2026-W07). Also from this day on I will upload strength training separately. I want to keep track of my strength volume. However, strength training wonâ€™t increase TP fitness (TSS set to 0 manually).
